cards.rules_text:
[/b]{W}{U} SEIZE THE CORE Seize Vryn itself. Gain a steady stream of energy. And play tempo cards to level the playing field.
{B}{U} COVERT CONSORTIUM Hit your opponents with sneaky creatures to uncover your opponents doom.
{B}{R} VEHICLE MAVERICKS Run over your opponent with Vehicles and use crewing creatures as cannon fodder.
{R}{G} ENERGIZED KICKER Accumulate energy and spend it to kick your spells into overdrive.
{G}{W} TEACH ABILITIES Modify your creatures with ability counters. Attack with big creatures.
{W}{B} PHYREXIAN ENTER THE BATTLEFIELD Reanimate and flicker your creatures to bury your opponent under a pile of value.
{U}{R} WIZARDS FROM EXILE Rebound is back. Combine it with impulse effects and other cast from exile synergies to show your spellcasting domination.
{G}{B} LEAVE THE GRAVE Make your cards leave the graveyard and get reward for it.
{R}{W} INSPIRED GEARS Attack your opponent with inspired creatures and double up on your value by cracking some gears.
{U}{G} ENGROSS FLASH Cast versatile spells during your opponents turn and disrupt them with counter-magic and spells with flash.
Decayed [i](This creature can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)[/i]

{1}, {T}, Exile this artifact: Search your library for a basic land card, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Activate only as a sorcery.
When this artifact leaves the battlefield, you may pay {G} and {E}. If you do, draw a card.

Ancient Echo can't be copied.
The next time you cast an instant or sorcery spell this turn, copy it. If you cast Ancient Echo or that spell from exile, you may copy that spell an additional time. You may choose new targets for the copies.

{T}, Return an artifact you control to its owner's hand: The next artifact spell you cast this turn costs {X} less to cast, where X is the mana value of the artifact returned to your hand this way. Activate only as a sorcery.

cards.rules_text: You get X {E}. Then you may pay any amount of {E}. When you do, teach up to that many target creatures you control trample X times. [i](To teach a creature trample, put a trample counter on it. If it already has trample, put a +1/+1 counter on it instead.)[/i]

When this enchantment enters, you get {E}{E}{E}{E}.
Lands you control have all basic land types. [i](Plains, Island, Swamp, Mountain, and Forest.)[/i]
Pay {E}{E}: Add one mana of any color.

Cascade [i](When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom in a random order.)[/i]
You may cast spells from your hand as though they had flash.

Whenever one or more creatures attacking you aren't blocked, their controller seizes The Core. [i](This triggers after blockers are declared.)[/i]
Whenever you seize The Core and at the beginning of your upkeep, choose one—
• You get {E}.
• Surveil 1.
{T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Add one mana of any color.

cards.rules_text: The owner of target artifact, battle, or enchantment shuffles it into their library and gains life equal to its mana value.
